body: yeah, im just wondering. i used to be quite active but yeah...

title: does anyone remember me?

replies.body: Avicus forums is not for you to post status updates and communicate regarding where you have been and such.
replies.body_tagged: Avicus forums is not for you to post status updates and communicate regarding where you have been and such.

replies.body: Yeah, I remember you, not well though.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I remember you, not well though.

replies.body:
1. Discussions surrounding personal updates is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continually uses the discussions for this purpose alone.
  2. Attention seeking status updates are prohibited. The Avicus Network forum is not designed to be a social network to keep others up to date with what is going on in your personal or online life, but rather an environment where all users are involved in discussions that pertain to larger and more relatable topics.
